name: Ascend (itch) (SiyaSIAY, Irene Li, Solitarie A)
description:
Wander around among the ruins of what appears to be an ancient civilization. Find out what happened. Find the secret of this world.

Controls

WASD to Move, Left Mouse Key to Interact, Right Mouse Key to Close UI.

Game Design

Irene Li, Attilio Rigotti, Sia Yang

Narrative Design

Irene Li

Game Development

Attilio Rigotti

World Building 

Sia Yang

Level Design

Irene Li, Attilio Rigotti, Sia Yang

Sound Design

Attilio Rigotti

Music

Arrival

DUNE: Bene Gesserit, by Hans Zimmer

Art Credits

Hand, Head, Eyeball, Geometric shapes, Toon shader, Low poly environment package, Skybox.
